MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 postcode area of Laurieston, affecting properties in Old Redding Road  and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have established there is an underground cable fault in the area, generators have been arranged however due to onsite difficulties we now expect your supply to be restored by 8.30pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:53pm on the 28th of April 2021.
